All Implemented Interfaces:
Dataset, FeatureClass, GeoDataset, MapDataset, Searchable, Selectable, Table
public class ShapefileFeatureClass
extends BaseFeatureClass
implements FeatureClass

This class defines the FeatureClass that will manage Shapefiles.

                      throws IOException
constructs a shapefile feature class

Parameters:
workspace - the workspace that contains the file
path - the path that contains the file
name - the name of the shapefile. The inclusion of the .shp" extension is optional.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs

searchEnvelope

public Cursor searchEnvelope(Envelope env,
                             QueryFilter query)
Description copied from class: BaseFeatureClass
A subclass will normally implement this method if it is considered desirable to use the search method implemented in this class.

By default this method returns null. You do not need to implement this method if you choose to re-implement the search() method differently.

Overrides:
searchEnvelope in class BaseFeatureClass
Parameters:
env - the requested Envelope
query - the original QueryFilter specified within search
Returns:
a cursor of resulting features, or null == no Cursor
See Also:
BaseFeatureClass.search(com.esri.mo2.data.feat.QueryFilter)
